text: “Sangafanane okhulupirira omwe akukhala osapita kunkhondo pomwe sali ovutika, ndi amene akumenya nkhondo yoyera pa njira ya Allah ndi chuma chawo ndi miyoyo yawo. Allah wawatukula pa ubwino ndi pa nyota amene akuchita Jihâd ndi chuma chawo ndi miyoyo yawo kuposa okhala. Koma onsewo Allah wawalonjeza zabwino. Koma wawapambanitsa ochita Jihâd malipiro aakulu kuposa ongokhala
